description: WikiLeaks releases “Collateral Murder” video that exposes war crimes and killing of Reuters journalists.
html: WikiLeaks releases “Collateral Murder” video that exposes war crimes and killing of Reuters journalists

description: Ex-hacker Adrian Lamo and Bradley Manning allegedly begin online conversations, which Lamo records and later turns in to DOD and Wired.com
Bradley arrested, placed in pre-trial confinement at Camp Arifjan in Kuwait
Bradley charged for leaking classified information.
